beats.visual: Mochi sets ring light; filter icons orbit neon colors.
beats.gag_note: Filter toggles between fish-eye and halo.

beats.visual: Selfie stick extends; other cats leap into frame.
Mochi poses; ring light becomes halo of emojis.
Filter swaps to vintage; room turns sepia instantly.
Bubble machine blasts; Mochi surfs bubbles mid-shot.
Camera timer counts down with giant digital numbers.
Flash triggers confetti moustaches on everyone.
Mochi reviews clip; screen fills with blooper thumbnails.
Final frame freeze with glitter border, everyone laughing.

tts_line: Mochi just wanted one normal selfie today.
style_prompt: cartoon chubby white cat, plush texture hints, clean bold outlines, flat pastel colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, bright selfie corner with ring light and floating emojis, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
